activity.title: Audit Logs
activity.subtitle: Event history for this Infisical project.

billing.title: Usage & Billing
billing.description: View and manage your organization's subscription here

starter.name: Starter
starter.text: Manage up to 3 project with up to 5 team members for free!

professional.name: Professional
professional.text: Keep up with key management as you grow.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.text: Keep up with key management as you grow.

common.error_project-already-exists: A project with this name already exists.
common.no-mobile: To use Infisical, please log in through a device with larger dimensions.
common.maintenance-alert: We are experiencing minor technical difficulties. We are working on solving it right now. Please come back in a few minutes.
common.drop-zone: Drag and drop a .env, .json, or .yml file here.
common.drop-zone-keys: Drag and drop a .env, .json, or .yml file here to add more secrets.

dashboard.title: Secrets
dashboard.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage their .env files.
dashboard.personal-description: Personal keys are only visible to you
dashboard.shared-description: Shared keys are visible to your whole team

check-docs.title: Good job!
check-docs.line2: Here is how to connect them to your codebase.

sidebar.override: Override value with a personal value
sidebar.personal-explanation: This secret is personal. It is not shared with any of your teammates.

delete-key-dialog.title: Delete Key
delete-key-dialog.confirm-delete-message: Are you sure you want to delete this secret? This cannot be undone.

approval.title: Admin Panel
approval.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage their .env files.

integrations.title: Project Integrations
integrations.description: Manage your integrations of Infisical with third-party services.
integrations.no-integrations1: You don't have any integrations set up yet. When you do, they will appear here.
integrations.no-integrations2: To start, click on any of the options below. It takes 5 clicks to set up.
integrations.available-text1: Click on the integration you want to connect. This will let your environment variables flow automatically into selected third-party services.
integrations.available-text2: Note: during an integration with Heroku, for security reasons, it is impossible to maintain end-to-end encryption. In theory, this lets Infisical decrypt yor environment variables. In practice, we can assure you that this will never be done, and it allows us to protect your secrets from bad actors online. The core Infisical service will always stay end-to-end encrypted. With any questions, reach out support@infisical.com.
integrations.click-to-start: Click on an integration to begin syncing secrets to it.
integrations.click-to-setup: Click on a framework to get the setup instructions.
integrations.grant-access-to-secrets: Grant Infisical access to your secrets
integrations.why-infisical-needs-access: Most cloud integrations require Infisical to be able to decrypt your secrets so they can be forwarded over.

login.title: Login
login.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage their .env files.

mfa.title: Sign Up
mfa.og-title: Replace .env files with 1 line of code. Sign Up for Infisical in 3 minutes.
mfa.og-description: Infisical a simple end-to-end encrypted platform that enables teams to sync and manage API-keys and environemntal variables. Works with Node.js, Next.js, Gatsby, Nest.js...
mfa.step1-privacy: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms and have read and acknowledged the Privacy Policy.
mfa.step2-message: We've sent a verification code to
mfa.step2-code-error: Oops. Your code is wrong. Tries left:
mfa.step2-spam-alert: Make sure to check your spam inbox.
mfa.step4-description1: If you get locked out of your account, your Emergency Kit is the only way to sign in.
mfa.step4-description2: We recommend you download it and keep it somewhere safe.
mfa.step4-description3: It contains your Secret Key which we cannot access or recover for you if you lose it.
mfa.step5-subtitle: Infisical is meant to be used with your teammates. Invite them to test it out.

api-key.api-keys-description: Every service token is specific to you, a certain project and a certain environment within this project.

add-dialog.title: Add an API Key
add-dialog.description: Specify the name and expiry period. When an API key is generated, you will only be able to see it once before it disappears. Make sure to save it somewhere.
add-dialog.name: API Key Name
add-dialog.copy-service-token-description: Once you close this popup, you will never see your API key again

incident.incident-contacts-description: These contacts will be notified in the unlikely event of a severe incident.

add-dialog.title: Add an Incident Contact
add-dialog.description: This contact will be notified in the unlikely event of a severe incident.

members.org-members-description: Manage members of your organization. These users could afterwards be formed into projects.

add-dialog.add-member-to-project: Add a member to your project
add-dialog.already-all-invited: All the users in your organization are already invited.
add-dialog.add-user-org-first: Add more users to the organization first.
add-dialog.user-will-email: The user will receive an email with the instructions.
add-dialog.looking-add: <0>If you are looking to add users to your org,</0><1>click here</1>

password.current-wrong: The current password may be wrong
password.validate-noNumOrSpecialChar: at least 1 number or special character
password.validate-breached: Password was found in a data breach.

token.service-tokens-description: Every service token is specific to you, a certain project and a certain environment within this project.

add-dialog.title: Add a service token for {{target}}
add-dialog.description: When a token is generated, you will only be able to see it once before it disappears. Make sure to save it somewhere.
add-dialog.name: Service Token Name
add-dialog.copy-service-token-description: Once you close this popup, you will never see your service token again

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.description: Manage webhooks to setup deployment hooks for your various integrations.

members.title: Project Members
members.description: This page shows the members of the selected project, and allows you to modify their permissions.

org.title: Organization Settings
org.description: Manage members of your organization. These users could afterwards be formed into projects.

personal.title: Personal Settings
personal.description: View and manage your personal information here.

emergency.name: Emergency Kit
emergency.text1: Your Emergency Kit contains the information you’ll need to sign in to your Infisical account.
emergency.text2: Only the latest issued Emergency Kit remains valid. To get a new Emergency Kit, verify your password.

api-keys.title: API Keys
api-keys.description: Manage your personal API Keys to access the Infisical API.

project.title: Project Settings
project.description: These settings only apply to the currently selected Project.
project.danger-zone-note: As soon as you delete this project, you will not be able to undo it. This will immediately remove all the keys. If you still want to do that, please enter the name of the project below.
project.delete-project-note: Note: You can only delete a project in case you have more than one
project.project-id-description: To integrate Infisical into your code base and get automatic injection of environmental variables, you should use the following Project ID.
project.project-id-description2: For more guidance, including code snipets for various languages and frameworks, see
project.auto-generated: This is your project's auto-generated unique identifier. It can't be changed.
project.auto-capitalization-description: According to standards, Infisical will automatically capitalize your keys. If you want to disable this feature, you can do so here.

signup.step2-message: We've sent a verification code to
